name: Dinosaur Coloring Books for Kids Toddler Game Free
name_original: Dinosaur Coloring Books for Kids Toddler Game Free
description:
Baby Dinosaur Coloring Page is an coloring book for all ages.

• Tens Picture of Baby Dinosaur
• 2 drawing modes: “touch to fill”, "finger draw",
• 120 colors to choose from
• view results in a gallery
• save the picture to your device's photo library
• share the picture via e-mail and Social Network
• undo button
• hint button
• lets your kids to draw and keeps walls clean
• works on iPhone, and iPad
